title: ECHS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 10 Pharmacist, Dental Assistant and Other Posts
description: Ex-Servicemen Contributory Health Scheme (ECHS) has published the official notification for 2025. To fill up the 10 vacancies for Medical Officer, Dental Officer, Dental Assistant, Pharmacist, Nursing Assistant, Lab Technician, Driver, and Other Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, B.Sc Nursing, GNM, B.Pharm, Diploma, 12th, 08th, or Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the ECHS Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salarystructure...
